com.koalog.util.swing.action
Class I18NAbstractAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      com.koalog.util.swing.action.I18NAbstractAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.Action, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AboutAction, DOMAddElement, DOMRemoveElement, ExitConfirmation, FileChooser, I18NMenu, LnFChooser, MessageAction, NewFile
public abstract class I18NAbstractAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

An internationalizable version of the AbstractAction.

By using this class as the super class for your actions, you make your action I18N. The way it works is by using keys instead of strings in all action methods that require a string. No all string values are localized.

It is recommanded to specify a resource bundle and a locale at the construction time.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
See Also:
AbstractAction

perform

public abstract java.awt.event.ActionEvent perform(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
Perform the action. That's where all the action logic goes. But no action flow logic is expected to be here. The flow logic takes place at a higher level and is based on the returned action events.

Parameters:
e - an action event
Returns:
An action event representing the action performed, or null if no action was performed or if the notification of the action performed should not be propagated.

setBundleName

public void setBundleName(java.lang.String name)
Set the name of the resource bundle to use for string translations.

Parameters:
name - The name of the resource bundle.

getValue

public java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.String key)
Get the internationalized value associated to the specified key. The internationalization is done only if the value is of type string. If the value is a string but does not yield to any other string, then it is returned unchanged.

Parameters:
key - The key of the object to retrieve.
Returns:
The object associate to the given key, translated if it is a String.

getRawValue

public java.lang.Object getRawValue(java.lang.String key)
Get the value associated to the specified key without performing any translation.

Parameters:
key - a string
Returns:
The value associated to the key.
